description: Schema definition for MADSci Data Manager MongoDB

datapoints.description: Main datapoints collection for storing all data references and metadata

indexes.name: datapoint_id_1
indexes.description: Unique constraint on datapoint_id for fast lookups

indexes.name: data_timestamp_desc
indexes.description: Index for efficient timestamp-based queries (most recent first)

indexes.name: data_type_asc
indexes.description: Index for filtering datapoints by type (file, value, etc.)

indexes.name: label_asc
indexes.description: Index for searching datapoints by label

indexes.name: data_type_timestamp_compound
indexes.description: Compound index for efficient data type + timestamp queries
